info.title: Gogs API
info.description: RESTful API for interacting with your Gogs instance. Follows a format similar to the GitHub REST API v3.

tags.name: Repositories
tags.description: Create, search, and manage repositories, branches, commits, and contents

tags.name: Collaborators and Deploy Keys
tags.description: Manage repository collaborators and deploy keys

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: Create, edit, and delete repository webhooks

tags.name: Issues
tags.description: Manage issues, comments, labels, and milestones

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Search users, manage access tokens, emails, followers, and public keys

tags.name: Miscellaneous
tags.description: Markdown rendering and Git data endpoints

post.summary: Create a repository in an organization
post.description: The authenticated user must be an owner of the specified organization.

204.description: The resource has been successfully deleted.

delete.description: Requires owner access to the repository.

204.description: Settings updated successfully.

post.description: Add a mirror repository to the sync queue. Returns 404 if the repository is not a mirror.

get.description: Get details for a single commit. Set Accept header to application/vnd.gogs.sha to return only the SHA-1 hash of a commit reference.

parameters.name: archive
parameters.description: Ref and format, e.g. master.zip or master.tar.gz

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Branch, tag, or commit. Defaults to the default branch.

get.description: Get the contents of a file, directory, symlink, or submodule in a repository.

put.description: Creates or updates a file in the repository. The content must be base64 encoded.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the file to create or update

branch.description: Branch to commit to. Defaults to the repository's default branch.

204.description: Collaborator has been added.
The resource has been successfully deleted.

get.summary: Check if a user is a collaborator
get.description: Returns 204 if the user is a collaborator, 404 if not.

204.description: User is a collaborator.

422.description: The specified user does not exist.

204.description: The resource has been successfully deleted.
The resource has been successfully deleted.

get.description: This endpoint may also return pull requests. If an issue is a pull request, the object will include a pull_request key.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only comments updated at or after this time (RFC 3339)

parameters.description: Only comments updated at or after this time (RFC 3339)

204.description: The resource has been successfully deleted.

204.description: The resource has been successfully deleted.

204.description: The resource has been successfully deleted.

get.description: Requests without authentication will return an empty email field for anti-spam purposes.

post.summary: Render a Markdown document in raw mode
post.description: Takes a Markdown document as plaintext and renders it without a repository context.

get.description: Returns commits from the HEAD of the default branch.

allow_public_wiki.description: Whether the wiki is publicly accessible

enable_external_wiki.description: Whether to use an external wiki

204.description: Wiki settings updated successfully.

get.description: Returns the editorconfig definition for the given filename in the repository.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename to get the editorconfig definition for

404.description: No editorconfig file exists or no matching definition for the filename.

get.description: Returns the content of a git blob object, base64 encoded.

get.summary: List issues assigned to the authenticated user
get.description: Lists issues across all repositories assigned to the authenticated user. Also available at `GET /issues`.

AccessToken.name: Authorization
AccessToken.description: Personal access token. Use format: token {YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN}

login.description: Alias of username for GitHub API compatibility

Collaborator.description: A repository collaborator with permission information
